about: Razorpay is a full-stack payments and banking platform for Indian businesses. It enables businesses to accept online payments, automate payouts, and manage financial operations.

products.payment_gateway: Accept payments via UPI, cards, netbanking, EMI, wallets, and more.
products.razorpayx: Business banking platform for payouts, vendor payments, payroll and current accounts.
products.subscriptions: Automated recurring billing for SaaS and subscription products.
products.payment_links: Create and share payment links without a website.
products.smart_collect: Virtual accounts and UPI IDs for automated reconciliation.
products.payouts: Send instant payouts at scale to customers, vendors, or employees.
products.capital: Short-term credit and working capital loans for businesses.

faq.a: Razorpay is a full-stack payment and banking platform that lets businesses accept payments, automate payouts, manage subscriptions, and handle financial operations.

faq.q: Do you have a free tier?
faq.a: There is no fixed free tier, but UPI payments are 0 percent fees. You only pay for transactions or specific products you use.
Razorpay is for Indian businesses of all sizes: startups, enterprises, D2C brands, SaaS platforms, e-commerce sellers, and freelancers.
